whatData.thirdPartyTitle: c) Third-Party Services (Cloudflare, Google Search Console)
whatData.thirdParty:
We use trusted third-party services to ensure the security, stability, and visibility of our website.

Cloudflare, Inc. provides DDoS protection, secure DNS resolution, and performance optimization. As part of these services, Cloudflare may process technical data such as your IP address and HTTP request headers. This processing occurs automatically and solely for security and operational purposes.

Google Search Console, a service provided by Google LLC, helps us monitor and maintain our website’s presence in Google Search results. It provides aggregated, non-personal performance data (such as search queries, impressions, and indexing information) and does not collect or store any personal data from visitors.

Both Cloudflare and Google act as independent data processors under applicable privacy regulations. For more information, see the Cloudflare Privacy Policy and the Google Privacy Policy.

projectScopeAndDeliverables.content: The scope of the project, including deliverables, timeline, and specific requirements, will be defined in a written agreement between the Client and Freelancer prior to the commencement of work. Any changes to the project scope may require an additional fee.

paymentTerms.title: 4. Payment Terms
list: A deposit of 30% of the total project cost is required before work begins. The remaining balance is due upon completion of the project or as outlined in the agreement.
Payments can be made via bank transfer, PayPal, or other mutually agreed payment methods.
If additional work or revisions are requested that were not included in the original agreement, those will be billed at a rate of 20 EUR/revision.

timelineAndDeadlines.content: We will make reasonable efforts to complete the project within the agreed timeline. However, delays may occur due to unforeseen circumstances, or if the Client does not provide necessary content, information, or feedback on time.

clientResponsibilities.title: 6. Client Responsibilities

The Client agrees to provide timely feedback and approvals as required for the project’s progress.
The Client is responsible for ensuring they have the necessary licenses or permissions for any third-party materials provided.

revisions.content: We offer 5 rounds of revisions as part of the project. Additional revisions will incur a fee of 20 EUR per revision.

ownershipAndRights.title: 8. Ownership and Rights
ownershipAndRights.content: Upon full payment, the Client will own the rights to the website and its content. However, we retain the right to showcase the project in our portfolio and marketing materials unless otherwise agreed.

confidentiality.title: 9. Confidentiality
confidentiality.content: We agree to keep all Client information confidential and not share it with third parties, except as necessary to perform the services or as required by law.

cancellationsAndRefunds.title: 10. Cancellations and Refunds
list: If the Client cancels the project after work has commenced, the deposit is non-refundable.

If the Client is dissatisfied with the work, they should notify us in writing. We will make reasonable efforts to resolve the issue. If the project is cancelled due to a breach of agreement, no refunds will be provided.
